item.title: TIL: Free assets for making games
item.description: Today I Leanred: itch.io offers thousands of game assets for free. Most of them are free to use even for the commercial purposes: this is great for solo game developers and enthusiasts willing to play around and create their own games with stunning visuals. Context Growing up, I loved playing computer games. That ultimately led me to learning how to program, because I always wanted to create one. Being a teenager, I picked up C# and Unity and participated in early stage of War for the Overworld (spiritual successor of Dungeon Keeper) game development.
